response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance efficiency and productivity in various fields. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $18,000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to experience the benefits of our product at a competitive advantage. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 18000}
